page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: A selection of comments about New Brighton made by a group of ten and eleven year old children; "I like New Brighton, it's nice and quiet" (Emma McTigue) "The beach and sea are very dirty" (Simon Doyle) "The houses are big and interesting to look at" (Peter Sprenger) "In the summer you can have a great time at the open air baths, on the beach or in the arcades. It's great"(Lee Madden) "I wish dog owners would stop letting their pets make a mess on the pavements. It's disgusting"(Michael Foster)
